title: client crashing over and over
body: My client just crashed for the third time today after pressing accept on a match... this time I actually lost 3 LP and it was considered a dodge. Can someone from riot PLEASE respond and look into this? Why don't I see anyone else posting about this issue?

replies.body:
What you're experiencing is likely caused by a *poor connection* to our servers. I'd strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which goes over some common solutions for typical connection issues with League.

Please let me know if these steps were able to resolve this for you.

I don't know if its the same problem, but me and a friend have had the match act like it will load up, but then show nothing. I know that my connection is solid as can be. It's cost us both LP because of this.
It definitely sounds like a similar issue. Have you worked through all the steps in the connection guide that I linked so we can be sure your network settings are configured for League properly?
